title: I want to read more but when I start reading, I'm unable to read for more than 1 and a half hours. Why has this happened? - Quora

response.answer_text: We all have short attention spans and that is increasingly getting shorter due to the increase in our screen time. So one and a half hours is good enough to read at a stretch, take a short break and then get back to reading. Maybe you can make short notes of what you read and then revert to reading.
